text.p: ValueVision Direct Marketing Co Inc has acquired Beautiful Images Inc, a Phoenix-based direct marketer of women's undergarments, for about $3.6 million in cash, ValueVision's parent company said Wednesday.
ValueVision Direct Marketing Co Inc is a subsidiary of ValueVision International Inc, which operates the third-largest television home-shopping network in the United States.
ValueVision International also said it expected Beautiful Images to contribute positively to its profit from operations. Beautiful Images has annual revenue of about $6 million.

In a related development, William Fitzgerald, 61, owner of Beautiful Images and former president and chief executive officer of Hanover House, a direct marketing company, is joining ValueVision as chief executive officer of its Montgomery Ward Direct catalog operations.
Montgomery Ward Direct is the former catalog business of Montgomery Ward & Co Inc. ValueVision completed the acquisition of the Montgomery Ward unit last month.
